plot: Deco is an only child and therefore the emperor of his kingdom. But he soon realizes how sad it his to rule alone and dreams of having a brother. The good news come, mom is expecting a baby. But mom gives him a sister instead.
title: Mulheres, bah!
plot_es: Deco is an only child and therefore the emperor of his kingdom. But he soon realizes how sad it his to rule alone and dreams of having a brother. The good news come, mom is expecting a baby. But mom gives him a sister instead.
plot_en: Deco is an only child and therefore the emperor of his kingdom. But he soon realizes how sad it his to rule alone and dreams of having a brother. The good news come, mom is expecting a baby. But mom gives him a sister instead.
